author: arnetheduck
content: I haven't looked at the implementations yet, but has anyone done a fork choice that works from the known heads and traverses towards tail / parents instead of starting with justfitied and traversing towards heads / children?

author: arnetheduck
content: the reason being that it's inefficient to keep a children list - most of the time it will contain only the one child of the canonical chain, so it makes sense to keep a list of "known heads" and travers backwards from there

author: arnetheduck
content: of course, having a list of known heads makes it possible to build the childrens list should there be need - potentially pruning simple paths like <@!361447803194441738> & co did - but I wonder if that's even necessary?
